attributes.action: Strip John Terry of the England captaincy before the World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Terry is not fit to lead England and is an embarrassment to our nation. He must be stripped of the England captaincy before the World Cup begins. Captaining your country is about more than sporting prowess, it’s about setting an example and being a fit and proper person to inspire achievement in others.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
